doc.field: DeVito and Solimene family photographs and papers
DeVito and Solimene family photographs and papers

Twenty-three photographs and ten documents of members of the 20th-century Italian-American DeVito and Solimene families of Brooklyn and Westchester County, New York. For further details about this collection, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to printroom@nyhistory.org.
